list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: mark (something) with colored patches or dirty marks that are not easily removed.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her clothing was stained with blood
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Quần áo của cô bị vấy máu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: color (a material or object) by applying a penetrative dye or chemical.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: wood can always be stained to a darker shade
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Gỗ luôn có thể được nhuộm thành một màu tối hơn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a colored patch or dirty mark that is difficult to remove.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there were mud stains on my shoes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có những vết bùn trên giày của tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a penetrative dye or chemical used in coloring a material or object.
